ProductInfo.Features:
Connectivity options: Designed for the most demanding commercial applications, the 320MP-2 gives you VGA, DVI, CVBS, HDMI, BNC and component connections.
Integrated speakers: Two 5 W built-in speakers mean no external speakers are required.
High Contrast ratio and response time: 4,000:1 static contrast ratio, 40,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and 8 ms response time combine to give you crisp, sharp, motion video full of detail.
Resolution - 1366x768
Optional TV tuner: You can add a digital TV tuner with a Samsung set back box (SBB-DT).
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung 32" 320MP-2 Commercial Display LCD1366X768 4000:1 Vga Dvi Bnc Blk 8Ms
